segment.documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the beginning of a message and to transmit the identifying number.
DTM, A segment to provide the date and time of the message.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to specify a reference applying to the whole message.

segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to specify a reference, e.g. reference to previous message.
DTM, A segment to indicate a date and time related to the reference.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to give information about the inspection of the means of transport and the associated results.

segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to specify the place where the means of transport has been inspected.
DTM, A segment to indicate the date and time of the inspection.

GOR, A segment to indicate the government agency involved (e.g. Maritime pollution inspection agency), the government involvement (e.g. an indication that a certain procedure is completed or required) and the government procedure (e.g. to indicate that charge of waste is required).

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to indicate the details of the means of transport, with related locations, arrival dates and times, measurement, etc.

segment.documentation: TDT, A segment to identify the means of transport (e.g. by Lloyd's Register number of a vessel, or by the license plate number of a truck) and the type of the means of transport.
DTM, A segment to indicate the date and time of departure in the place or port of call.
LOC, A segment to indicate a location relating to the means of transport, such as: - place or port of departure - next place or port of call.
RFF, A segment to specify a reference as an additional identification of the means of transport, e.g. radio call sign of a vessel.
MEA, A segment to specify a measurement of the means of transport, e.g. gross tonnage (of a vessel).

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to identify a party which could give further information on the conveyance of the means of transport.

segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to identify a party's name, address and function from which further information can be obtained (e.g. port authority, harbour master).

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to indicate a contact within the party.

segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department within the party.
COM, A segment to identify a communication number of the contact to whom communication should be directed.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments to specify the result of the inspection of the means of transport, in terms of marine pollutant waste on board.

segment.documentation: DGS, A segment to specify the type of marine pollutant and its subdivision according to the MARPOL regulation (i.e. Maritime Pollution Regulation), as found on board during inspection. Data element 8273 is to be used to indicate the MARPOL regulation, regarding the prevention of maritime pollution by ocean-going vessels issued by the International Maritime Organization (IMO). Data element 8351 is to be used to indicate MARPOL type (e.g. I or IV), which identifies the hazard code. Data element 8078 is to be used to indicate the MARPOL type subdivision, which identifies an additional hazard code classification.
MEA, A segment to specify the net weight of waste to be discharged, for the MARPOL type and subdivision of goods as indicated in DGS.
SGP, A segment to indicate the equipment in which the dangerous goods are loaded.
